mapper.select: SELECT R.FREE_RE_NO, R.FREE_NO, R.MEM_NM, R.MEM_NO, R.FREE_RE_CON, R.FREE_RE_DT FROM (SELECT R.FREE_RE_NO, F.FREE_NO, M.MEM_NM, R.MEM_NO, R.FREE_RE_CON, TO_CHAR(FREE_RE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') AS FREE_RE_DT, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY R.FREE_RE_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM FREE_RE R INNER JOIN FREE F ON R.FREE_NO = F.FREE_NO INNER JOIN MEM M ON R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE FREE_RE_DEL = 1 ) R WHERE R.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt} AND R.FREE_NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FREE_RE WHERE FREE_RE_DEL = 1 AND FREE_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_RE (FREE_RE_NO, FREE_NO, MEM_NO, FREE_RE_CON) VALUES (FREE_RE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{no}, #{mno}, #{con})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_RE SET FREE_RE_DEL = 0 WHERE FREE_RE_NO = #{reno}
UPDATE FREE_RE SET FREE_RE_CON = #{con2} WHERE FREE_RE_NO = #{reno}
